meanings.definition: The state or quality of being defective.
meanings.sent1: The defectiveness of the product was evident in its poor quality.
meanings.sent2: The defectiveness of the machine caused it to malfunction.
meanings.sent3: Despite its defectiveness, the toy still brought joy to the child.
meanings.sent4: The defectiveness of the plan became apparent when it failed to work as expected.
meanings.sent5: The defectiveness of the bridge posed a serious safety risk to drivers.

meanings.sent3: The defectiveness of the cake's decoration made it look unique.
meanings.sent4: His flawlessness highlighted the defectiveness of his rival's performance.
meanings.sent5: The imperfection in the diamond revealed its defectiveness under scrutiny.
